statements: SELECT * FROM coaches WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT coach_name FROM coaches WHERE certifications IS NULL;
SELECT coach_id, coach_name FROM coaches WHERE certifications @> ARRAY['CPR'];
SELECT * FROM coaches WHERE training_schedules->>'2022-09-01' = 'Full Day Training';
SELECT coach_id, performance_evaluations FROM coaches WHERE performance_evaluations->>'rating' > '7';
SELECT * FROM coaches WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT coach_name, certifications FROM coaches WHERE coach_id = 2;
SELECT coach_name FROM coaches WHERE certifications @> ARRAY['Level 1'::TEXT];
SELECT * FROM coaches WHERE training_schedules @> '{"day": "Monday"}'::JSONB;
SELECT coach_name, performance_evaluations->'overall_rating' AS rating FROM coaches WHERE coach_id = 3;
SELECT coach_id, coach_name, certifications FROM coach_information;
SELECT coach_name, certifications FROM coach_information WHERE coach_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT coach_id, coach_name, training_schedules FROM coach_information ORDER BY coach_id DESC;
SELECT schedule_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_schedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT coach_name, certifications, training_schedules FROM coach_information WHERE certifications LIKE '%certified%' AND coach_name ILIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM coach_information WHERE coach_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT coach_name, certifications FROM coach_information WHERE coach_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT coach_id, training_schedules FROM coach_information WHERE certifications @> ARRAY['CPR']::TEXT[];
SELECT * FROM training_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT schedule_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_schedule WHERE coach_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM coaches
SELECT name, certification FROM coaches WHERE certification = 'Level 1'
SELECT coach_id, name, certification FROM coaches ORDER BY coach_id DESC
SELECT * FROM training_schedules WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT coach_id, AVG(evaluation_score) AS average_score FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY coach_id
SELECT * FROM coaches WHERE certification = 'Level 1' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, certification FROM coaches WHERE certification LIKE 'Level%' AND name LIKE 'M%' LIMIT 5
SELECT coach_id, name, certification FROM coaches JOIN training_schedules ON coaches.coach_id = training_schedules.coach_id WHERE location = 'Gym A' ORDER BY start_time ASC, end_time DESC
SELECT evaluation_id, coach_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_score >= 80 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC

SELECT coach_id, name, certification, evaluation_score FROM coaches JOIN performance_evaluations ON coaches.coach_id = performance_evaluations.coach_id WHERE evaluation_score < 60 ORDER BY certification ASC, name ASC
SELECT * FROM coach_info;
SELECT coach_name, training_schedule FROM coach_info WHERE certification='XYZ';
SELECT certification.cert_name, certification.organization, certification.expiration_date FROM certification INNER JOIN coach_info ON certification.cert_id = coach_info.certification;
SELECT coach_name, evaluation FROM coach_info JOIN evaluation ON coach_info.coach_id = evaluation.coach_id WHERE evaluation.eval_date='2022-01-01';

SELECT coach_name, training_schedule.schedule_date, training_schedule.start_time, training_schedule.end_time FROM coach_info JOIN training_schedule ON coach_info.coach_id = training_schedule.coach_id;
SELECT coach_name, certification FROM coach_info WHERE certification = 'Level 1' LIMIT 5;

SELECT coach_name, training_schedule.schedule_date, training_schedule.start_time, training_schedule.end_time FROM coach_info JOIN training_schedule ON coach_info.coach_id = training_schedule.coach_id WHERE coach_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY training_schedule.schedule_date DESC;

SELECT coach_name, evaluation.eval_date, evaluation.evaluation FROM coach_info JOIN evaluation ON coach_info.coach_id = evaluation.coach_id WHERE evaluation.evaluation LIKE '%positive%' AND evaluation.eval_date <= '2021-12-31';

SELECT coach_name, certification.organization, certification.expiration_date FROM coach_info JOIN certification ON coach_info.certification = certification.cert_name ORDER BY certification.expiration_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT coach_name, COUNT(eval_id) AS num_evaluations FROM coach_info JOIN evaluation ON coach_info.coach_id = evaluation.coach_id GROUP BY coach_name HAVING num_evaluations > 2 ORDER BY num_evaluations DESC;
SELECT * FROM coaches;
SELECT name, certifications FROM coaches WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT session_date, session_duration FROM coaching_sessions WHERE coach_id = 2 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT coach_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_result FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_result > 4;
SELECT client_id, coach_id FROM coach_clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM coaches ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT coach_id, name, certifications FROM coaches WHERE coach_id = 3;
SELECT coach_id, name FROM coaches WHERE certifications IS NOT NULL;
SELECT coach_id, COUNT(client_id) AS client_count FROM coach_clients GROUP BY coach_id;

SELECT coaches.name, coaching_sessions.session_date, coaching_sessions.session_duration FROM coaches JOIN coaching_sessions ON coaches.coach_id = coaching_sessions.coach_id ORDER BY coaching_sessions.session_date DESC;
